name: The Flap Hat
description:
This is a great hat for keeping your ears warm with the choice of having the ear flaps up or down. They are fastened up with wooden buttons.

Available in cream, black, navy, brown, teal, chilli pepper red and oatmeal. 

Made from a chunky merino wool blend yarn.

All items are freshly knitted to order and take 3-5 working days to be dispatched.

name: Red Bow Alice Band
description:
This is a very pretty bright red hand knitted and crochet bow alice band.

The bow alice band can be worn as a headband, bracelet or necklace The band is a long crocheted string and ties in a little bow at the back. Will fit all sizes.

The Alice band is available in many colours so please contact me for requests.

All items are freshly knitted to order and take 3-5 working days to be dispatched.

name: Shopper Bag
description:
The Shopper bag is made from a lovely thick wool blend yarn and is knitted in a way that will allow the bag to stretch in all directions depending on what is in it.

The bag has two thickly knitted straps and a big button to close it. I try to use large vintage buttons so they will be subject to change but as close to the photographed button as possible.

Please contact me for information on more colourways. 

All items are freshly knitted to order and take 3-5 working days to be dispatched.

name: Coffee Cup Cozy Sling
description:
This is a lovely little coffee cup sling to keep your hands and coffee nice and toasty in a bright red wool blend yarn.

The cozy has an open bottom so can fit any size coffee container. Has been tried and tested many times and really works!

Would make a great gift for a coffee/tea lover.

Available in other colours so please contact me if you have any suggestions.

All items are freshly knitted to order and take 3-5 working days to be dispatched.

name: Pom Pom Chunky Scarf
description:
This is a gorgeous hand knitted long grey woolen scarf with extra big pom poms.

Although it is very chunky it is very light, soft and comfortable to wear. Great for those chilly Spring/Summer evenings!

Made from 100% of the softest pure wool. Cool hand wash only.

Available in many colours so please contact me for more information. 

All items are freshly knitted to order and take 3-5 working days to be dispatched.
